title: Intuitive Machines to acquire Lanteris Space Systems
summary:
Intuitive Machines, a lunar lander company, announced Nov. 4 it is buying Lanteris Space Systems, a satellite builder formerly known as Maxar.

title: China conducts ground tests on inflatable, reconfigurable space manufacturing module
summary:
A Chinese institute recently completed ground tests on what it describes as a reconfigurable flexible on-orbit manufacturing platform, targeting future large-scale, low-cost space manufacturing.

title: View from above: Ariane 6 for Sentinel-1D on the launch pad
OHB Purchases Remaining Stake in MT Aerospace
summary:
German space technology company OHB has purchased the remaining 30 percent stake in MT Aerospace from Apollo Capital Partners, completing a full takeover of the Augsburg-based company. MT Aerospace is a German aerospace manufacturer that designs and manufactures lightweight metal and composite structures for launch vehicles, satellites, and defence systems. title: Lawmakers warn UK must act now to get space ambitions back on track
summary:
The United Kingdom must move swiftly to turn ambition into action after falling short of a vision outlined three years ago to become a major global space power, a cross-party parliamentary committee warned Nov. 3.
